comment: Turrets use volume as a measure of dispersion and recoil doesn't affect vehicles; so for the moment, I left those as zero.  This will change as soon as these issues are addressed.
name: mountable NX-17 pulse rifle
description: A powerful energy rifle, the addition of a capacitor allows the weapon to fire in controlled bursts.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.

name: mountable Tesla cannon
description: This alteration of the Chain Lightning bionic fires artificial lightning bolts that arc to nearby enemies.  It must be attached to a large power source, but it allows for much more powerful bolts.

name: mountable laser cannon
description: This mounted laser may lack the damage capabilities of conventional heavy weapons, but it's a scientifically proven fact that traveling at the speed of light does wonders for one's overall deadliness.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.

name: mountable turbolaser cannon
description: With an augmented emitter and capacitor, this mounted laser is capable of superheating most materials to the point of exploding.  The firing mechanism also requires the services of a specialized chassis, and one must be wary of the prodigious power needs of such a weapon.

name: mountable pulse laser
description: Although this laser weapon has rather low damage capability, it is capable of firing in rapid bursts.  The increased power requirements require a significant power source and the firing mechanism also requires a specialized chassis.

name: mountable needler
description: This improved nailgun features a special firing mechanism that is set to fire a spread of up to 5 nails at once; sure to drop the hammer on its unfortunate targets.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldy, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.

name: mountable scorpion ballista
description: This massive crossbow is mounted on a rotating frame.  The hand-crank allows one to draw it without the need for heavy labor.  It's far too massive to be used on foot, and thus needs to be mounted on a vehicle turret chassis in order to be operated.

name: mountable spear launcher
description: A tension-operated speargun mounted on a rotating frame.  It sports five launchers clustered together that can be launched in a salvo or singularly.  A hand-crank lets one draw the strings quickly.

name: mountable slingshot cannon
description: Essentially several long drawstrings held by two long, reinforced sides and a mechanism attached to a crank to draw and fire it.  It's deceptively powerful and surprisingly accurate, but far too large to be used without some sort of stable platform.

name: mountable avalanche rifle
description: This pneumatic assault rifle has been greatly enhanced, firing projectiles faster and with higher velocity.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldy, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.

name: mountable rotary cannon
description: This fearsome weapon sports 3 barrels in a cyclic configuration.  A specialized system loads the otherwise troublesome rounds; allowing it to be fired in quick succession.  However, these features render it incredibly unwieldy, and it must be mounted on a turret chassis in order to be fired.

name: thundergun
description: Essentially an upsized shotgun, this explosive hazard will practically vaporize anything it's set against.  However, the limited range will also put its user at extreme risk if not managed correctly.  You'll need some form of platform to mount this behemoth on.

name: mountable storm bolter
description: This pneumatic bolt thrower has been greatly enhanced, allowing multiple bolts to be launched accurately and in quick succession.  It requires a specialized chassis in order to be operated.

name: mountable splintergun
description: A heavily modified coilgun that fires tiny fragments of metal at high speeds extremely quickly.  The resulting barrage is highly inaccurate, but can turn unarmored targets into pulp.  It must be mounted on a specialized chassis in order to be fired.

name: mountable perforator
description: A coilgun with improved electromagnetic circuits to be able to propel a metallic projectile at high speed and with great accuracy.  Capable of piercing armor with little issue, though the projectile itself lacks damage due to its small size.  It must be mounted on a specialized chassis in order to be fired.

name: mountable hypervelocity driver
description: A single-shot, electrically propelled, steel rail launcher.  The powerful, and frankly dangerous, improvements made to the power systems of this weapon is capable imbuing a massive charge into a single-rail; so much that it often shatters into deadly fragments on impact.  It's capabilities are limited by its prodigious power requirements however, and its large size necessitates a specially made turret mount be installed first.

name: mountable ripper
description: This menacing weapon launches large, bladed disks that rips through enemies with devastating effect.  It draws its power from a vehicle's engines, and thus requires a specialized chassis in order to function.
